definition: discharge volume/engine capacity/engine displacement (volume of air fuel mixture drawn in during one cycle)
a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The government has just published the criteria for small-displacement vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 政府剛剛公佈了小排量車的標準。

sentences.english: BYD also makes small gasoline-powered cars and is having no trouble selling them.
sentences.chinese: 比亞迪也製造輕型小排量汽車，銷售相當順利。

sentences.english: The Bank of Scotland announces a 65% reduction in carbon emissions over the last two years.
sentences.chinese: 蘇格蘭銀行宣佈，過去兩年，碳排量已減少六成五。

sentences.english: Why not have one big cylinder of the same displacement of the eight cylinders instead?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不用具有八個氣缸同等排量的一個大氣缸代替？

sentences.english: But has this zero emissions transport solution been oversold?
sentences.chinese: 但是這一零排量交通解決方案有多少浮誇的成分呢？

sentences.english: Several diaphragms can be combined to serve the working places needing large fas amount discharged.
sentences.chinese: 可以實現多個膜盒組合，使用於大的排量場合。

sentences.english: The same powerful positive displacement blower technology used in large truck mounted vacuums is employed in the SAVE-YOUR-BACK-VAC.
sentences.chinese: 吸塵器上還使用了同樣強大的正排量鼓風機技術。

sentences.english: Capable of combination of multiple bellows, suitable for large discharge.
sentences.chinese: 可以實現多個膜盒組合，適用於大的排量場合。

sentences.english: In China, when consumers consider their vehicle purchases, they focus on engine displacement.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，當消費者購買車輛時，他們側重於排量。

sentences.english: A high-pressure, high-volume pump used in hydraulic fracturing treatments.
sentences.chinese: 在水力壓裂處理中所使用的一種高壓高排量泵。

sentences.english: We must invent, develop and implement — on a global scale — low-carbon means of using power.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須在全球範圍內發現發展和推廣低碳排量能源。

sentences.english: China will tighten requirements for remaining subsidies for those vehicles beginning next month.
sentences.chinese: 從下個月開始，中國將收緊小排量車的補貼政策。

sentences.english: They use less fuel than larger automobiles, the government argued.
sentences.chinese: 因爲與大排量車相比較，它們很省油。

sentences.english: Can big rows amount buying in stone tablet stone motorcycle real plate?
sentences.chinese: 在碣石買的大排量摩托車能上真牌？
